img_text: dea THE FUTUFE IS FEMALE A DOPT A-MIGRANT Had enough of Drumpfs heartless posturing on the migrant caravan? Put your home where your heart is! Volunteer to adopt one of 10,000+ victims of imperial violence & economic terrorism & tell the world that Americans aren't just cold consumers of mindless materialism. Email your intention to migrant.me@dnc.org today & be a part of the solution! First 5,000 volunteers get a free THE FUTURE IS FEMALE tshirt.
